snippet.title: DeLight: The Journey Home - Chapter 2 Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam: https://bit.ly/2JFmIhv
Available now on AppStore: https://apple.co/3e2EING
Available now on Google Play: https://bit.ly/31KEjL7

In Chapter 2, Sammy finds herself in a temporary shelter where she lives among total strangers and reunites with a few familiar faces. In this new environment, Sammy has to prepare herself to the changes that happened. Will she be able to find her footing again before getting to her parents?

Find out more about DeLight:
Website: https://www.dreamtreegames.com/delight
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/playdelight
Twitter: https://twitter.com/delight_fanpage
Discord: https://discord.gg/hqqFVS3

Find out more about DreamTree Games:
Website: https://www.dreamtreegames.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/dreamtreegames
Twitter: https://twitter.com/dreamtreegames
